entry.title: A-Mikayelyan/TodoForge: "TaskFlow: A modern, lightweight to-do app designed to keep you organized and focused. entry.title: naitikraj1000/Simple-Portfolio-Tracker: A lightweight and easy-to-use application to track your investments and portfolio performance. This tool allows you to manage assets, monitor profits/losses, and analyze holdings efficiently. Perfect for personal use or small-scale portfolio management.
entry.content: A lightweight and easy-to-use application to track your investments and portfolio performance. This tool allows you to manage assets, monitor profits/losses, and analyze holdings efficiently. Perfect for personal use or small-scale portfolio management.
